metadata.title: Badger Sport Digi-Camo Short & Long Sleeve Side Panel Athletic Performance Wicking Shirt/Jersey (18 Colors, Youth/Adult)
features: Badger Sport Digi-Camo Athletic Sports Wicking Shirt/Jersey.
Sublimited Digi-Camo Side & Sleeve Panel Inserts.
Worn for Casual School Wear and as a Jersey/Uniform Top for all Sports games and practices for Baseball, Softball, Basketball, Lacrosse, Soccer, Volleyball, Football, etc.
18 Digi-Camo Colors in Short & Long Sleeve Youth & Adult Sizes
description: Badger Sport Digi-Camo Athletic Sports Wicking Shirt/Jersey. 100% Poly Moisture Management Performance Fabric. Sublimited Digital Side & Sleeve Panel Inserts. Worn for Casual School Wear and as a Jersey/Uniform Top for all Sports games and practices for Baseball, Softball, Basketball, Lacrosse, Soccer, Volleyball, Football, etc. 18 Different Digi-Camo Colors, Short & Long Sleeve Youth/Adult.
